original_text: “My people have been lost sheep. Their shepherds have led them astray, turning them away on the mountains. From mountain to hill they have gone. They have forgotten their fold.
korean_text: 내 백성은 잃어 버린 양 떼로다 그 목자들이 그들을 곁길로 가게 하여 산으로 돌이키게 하였으므로 그들이 산에서 언덕으로 돌아다니며 쉴 곳을 잊었도다

sentences.original_text: My people have been lost sheep.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성은 길 잃은 양이 되었도다.

sentences.original_text: Their shepherds have led them astray,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 목자들이 그들을 길에서 잃게 하였으며,

sentences.original_text: turning them away on the mountains.
From mountain to hill they have gone.
